New Records: Mitchell Marsh's innings reminds me of a certain Watto innings against Bang too
Till Tuesday, that was, in fact, the highest individual score by an Australia men's batter in ODI cricket
Key Match Events: Mitchell Marsh scored an unbeaten 177 off 132 balls
Steven Smith picked up his second fifty of this World Cup
Australia chased down 307 at an absolute canter
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins: 'Good problems to have. All 15 have played this tournament now and I feel we can pick any one of them'
Najmul Hossain Shanto: 'If we score 340-350, it could have been different'
Mitchell Marsh: 'Can't wait, mate. It is going to be a ripper. The four best teams are playing in the semis and I cannot wait to get to Kolkata'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's only solace is that they avoided damage to net run-rate and will likely qualify for Champions Trophy
Australia will want to polish this game off before semi-final
